snippet: Representative Charles B. Rangel and State Senator Adriano Espaillat are separated by only 802 votes as more than 2,000 absentee and affidavit ballots remain to be counted.
abstract: Rep Charles B Rangel of New York and State Senator Adriano Espaillat are separated by only 802 votes as more than 2,000 absentee and affidavit ballots remain to be counted in battle for 13th Congressional District seat.
lead_paragraph: Representative Charles B. Rangel and State Senator Adriano Espaillat are separated by only 802 votes as more than 2,000 absentee and affidavit ballots remain to be counted.

headline.seo: Rangel’s Victory Margin Shrinks in New Vote Tally
headline.main: Victory Margin for Rangel Narrows in New Vote Tally
headline.print_headline: Victory Margin for Rangel Narrows in New Vote Tally
